did.unittitle: Cowan and Murray, George. United States, New Year's Card
De Young, Isaac. Philadelphia, PA, Leaf from a book with an advertising lithograph print of Isaac D'Young's fancy store
Eybeschutz, Jonathan. Altona, Germany, Copper engraving entitled "Portrait of Rabbi Jonathan ben Nathan Eybeschütz (1690-1764)", designed by Wilhelm Kleinhard and engraved by Johann Balzer
Fecit, Alex Edouard.
Finkelstein, M. J. and Schwartz, E. Brooklyn, NY, Hew Year's card sent to Mr. and Mrs. E Schwartz by M. J. Finkelstein
Fisher, A.J. New York, NY, Antisemitic caricature of a banker
Gelb, M. J. St. Louis, MO, A Yortzite calendar in a superb Jewish American folk art form. Rendered in watercolor by M.J. Gelb. Commissioned by the son of the deceased Marcus Blatt in 1919
Gratz, Hyman. Philadelphia, PA, Portrait of Hyman Gratz in a distinguished pose sitting in a chair, done by Levytype Co., Philadelphia, PA
Haye Olam and Orphan Kitche. Jerusalem, Palestine

Hayes, Isaac Israel. Philadelphia, PA, Lithograph of Satterlee Unites States General Hospital, West Philadelphia, printed in color by Charles Magnus, and published by James D. Gay, 1864. Lists Dr. Isaac Israel Hayes
Ingersoll, T. W. Jerusalem, Stereograph of the inside of the Jaffa Gate in Jerusalem

Isaacs and Sons. New York, NY, Front: Ink drawing of an old street. All the houses are pawn shops, including "Isaacs and Sons' Pawn Brokers." Back: "Hocking valley was unusually quiet. Wall street report." Signed T.M.F
Jennings, London. , Illustration of of the court of a Jew's house at Tetuan
Keen, A. , Illustration of a couple moving. Includes several signatures

Klauber, Edward. Louisville, KY, Print of Adas Israel by E. Klauber, a hand written contemporary note is glued to the print, "Entered according to Act of Congress by E. Klauber," most likely in Klauber's hand writing
Krauskopf, Jos. Kansas City, MO, Custom printed New Year's card, mostly in English, from Rabbi Jos. Krausopf and his wife
Lazarus, Emma. New York, NY, Emma Lazarus Award
Levinthal, B. L. Philadelphia, PA, Custom printed New year's card in Yiddish and English from Rabbi B. L. Levinthal
Levinthal, B. L. Philadelphia, PA, Custom printed New year's card in Yiddish and English from Rabbi B. L. Levinthal and his wife
Levy, Uriah P. Philadelphia, PA, Bust view lithograph of Uriah P. Levy in full uniform, by C. Girard
Lewis, William.
Lichtenstein Brothers. New York, NY, Advertising lithograph poster with an illustration of the Lichtenstein Brothers factory in three colors
Mendelssohn, Moses.
Mendoza, Daniel. London, England, Print of the famous fight at the Odiham between Humphrey and Daniel Mendoza (1763-1836)
Menken, Ada Isaacs. Philadelphia, PA, A Fisher and Turner wood block print of Mazeppa bound to the back of a horse. This is the scene that Ada Menken made famous on the stage
Miller, Lucius A. Admiral, MD, Roll of honor for Company E 315th Infantry for service in WWI
Montefiore, Moses.
Moses. , Illustration of Moses with the tables of the Law
Norton, Joshua Abraham. San Francisco, CA, Multi-colored cabinet lothograph of Joshua Abraham Norton, the famous San Francisco eccentric, in uniform carrying his sword

Ottens, Josua and De Fonseca. Jew's Town, Suriname, Oldest known map of Surinam, founded in 1627 by Abraham van Pere, possibly a member of a Portuguese Jewish refugee family, based on Mogge's map of 1671 marking theh "joods Dorp en Sinagoge" (Jew's town and synagogue) and many Jewish plantation owners
Penn, John. , Map and calculations
